revised_title: Reconsideration of Shock-Shock Relations for Non-Quiescent Gas and Experimental Verification
tldr: The authors reevaluate the shock-shock relations for the case of a non-quiescent gas ahead of a shock and compare them with experiments. They find that their developed model provides better predictions than Han & Yin's (1993) model, which contains an error. The study includes comparisons with experimental and numerical results for two cases of shock-wave interaction, demonstrating the improved accuracy of the new model.
